article_title: 10 Over-the-top Home Luxuries for the Super Rich
article_text:
Violin-shaped pool

This 1,350 square-foot custom-made swimming pool is a larger-than-life replica of the homeowner’s 1700s-era Stradivarius violin. Thousands of fiber-optic lights illuminate the instrument’s contours at night.
